statements: SELECT * FROM LegalDocuments;
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM LegalDocuments ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT document_id, document_name, upload_date FROM LegalDocuments WHERE document_name LIKE '%contract%';
SELECT document_id, document_name, digital_signature FROM LegalDocuments ORDER BY document_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM LegalDocuments WHERE upload_date > '2022-01-01' AND upload_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM LegalDocuments ORDER BY upload_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT document_name, upload_date FROM LegalDocuments WHERE upload_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM LegalDocuments WHERE document_name LIKE '%contract%'
SELECT * FROM LegalDocuments ORDER BY document_name ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT document_id, digital_signature FROM LegalDocuments WHERE upload_date < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
SELECT * FROM legal_documents;
SELECT document_name, document_content FROM legal_documents WHERE document_id = 3;
SELECT document_name, document_hash FROM legal_documents ORDER BY document_name ASC;
SELECT signer_name, signature_hash FROM digital_signatures WHERE document_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM digital_signatures ORDER BY signature_id DESC;
SELECT document_name FROM legal_documents WHERE document_id = 1;
SELECT signer_name, signature_hash FROM digital_signatures WHERE signature_id > 100;
SELECT document_name, signer_name FROM legal_documents JOIN digital_signatures ON legal_documents.document_id = digital_signatures.document_id;
SELECT document_id, document_name, signature_hash FROM legal_documents LEFT JOIN digital_signatures ON legal_documents.document_id = digital_signatures.document_id;
SELECT * FROM legal_documents WHERE document_name LIKE '%agreement%' ORDER BY document_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM LegalDocuments;
SELECT document_name, document_sha256 FROM LegalDocuments WHERE document_id = 1;
SELECT document_id, document_name, LENGTH(document_content) AS content_length FROM LegalDocuments;
SELECT contract_name, contract_status, timestamp FROM Contracts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT signer_name, signature_hash, timestamp FROM Signatures ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT document_name, document_sha256 FROM LegalDocuments WHERE document_id = 1;
SELECT document_name, document_content FROM LegalDocuments WHERE document_name LIKE '%agreement%';
SELECT signer_name, timestamp FROM Signatures WHERE signature_id IN (SELECT signature_id FROM Contracts WHERE contract_status = 'active');
SELECT document_name, contract_name FROM LegalDocuments INNER JOIN Contracts ON LegalDocuments.document_id = Contracts.document_id WHERE Contracts.contract_status = 'active';
SELECT document_name, signer_name, timestamp FROM LegalDocuments INNER JOIN Signatures ON LegalDocuments.document_id = Signatures.document_id WHERE Signatures.timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM legal_documents;
SELECT document_id, document_content, digital_signature FROM legal_documents;
SELECT contract_title, client_name, signing_date FROM contract_management;
SELECT platform_name, platform_version FROM blockchain_platform;
SELECT * FROM signature_logs;
SELECT * FROM legal_documents WHERE document_id = 1;
SELECT document_content, digital_signature FROM legal_documents WHERE document_id = 2 ORDER BY document_id DESC;
SELECT client_name, signing_date FROM contract_management WHERE signing_date >= '2022-01-01' AND signing_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT platform_name, platform_version, deploy_date FROM blockchain_platform WHERE platform_version LIKE '%2.0%' ORDER BY deploy_date ASC;
SELECT log_id, document_id, signature_status, timestamp FROM signature_logs WHERE signature_status = 'verified' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM LegalDocuments;
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM LegalDocuments WHERE document_timestamp > NOW();
SELECT document_id, document_content FROM LegalDocuments WHERE document_name LIKE '%agreement%';
SELECT * FROM Signatures ORDER BY signature_timestamp DESC;
SELECT contract_name, contract_type FROM Contracts WHERE contract_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM LegalDocuments WHERE document_name LIKE '%confidential%';
SELECT document_name, document_timestamp FROM LegalDocuments ORDER BY document_timestamp DESC;
SELECT contract_name, contract_type, contract_timestamp FROM Contracts WHERE contract_timestamp > '2022-01-01' LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_name, user_role FROM Users WHERE user_role = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM Signatures JOIN Contracts ON Signatures.document_id = Contracts.contract_id WHERE Signatures.signer_name = 'Alice';
